src:
Mencari Tanda-Tanda Perkembangan Arsenal di Bawah Unai Emery
05 Nov 2019, 11:18 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery didatangkan untuk mengembangkan Arsenal, tapi sejauh ini yang tampak adalah tanda-tanda kemerosotan. Teriakan frustrasi fans Arsenal kian kuat terdengar, duduk Emery pun tak lagi nyaman.
Kekhawatiran ini muncul usai serangkaian hasil minor Arsenal di semua kompetisi. Mereka tidak bisa menjaga konsistensi. Terkadang menang besar, lalu takluk konyol pada laga berikutnya.
Arsenal menelan dua hasil imbang beruntun di Premier League kontra Crystal Palace (2-2) dan Wolverhampton (1-1). Pada dua laga itu, Arsenal sempat unggul terlebih dahulu, tapi mereka lengah dan membiarkan lawan membalas.
Masalah ini bukan pertama kalinya terjadi, Arsenal selalu seperti itu, bahkan sejak era Arsene Wenger. Sebab itu, Emery dinilai tidak benar-benar mengembangkan Arsenal, justru mungkin lebih parah.
Posisi Emery kian sulit karena sebenarnya ada pemain-pemain hebat dalam skuad Arsenal. Dilansir dari Sky Sports, baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Looking for Signs of Arsenal's Development Under Unai Emery
05 Nov 2019, 11:18 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery was brought in to develop Arsenal, but so far what seems is a sign of deterioration. Shouts of frustration from Arsenal fans grew stronger, and Emery's seat was no longer comfortable.
This concern arises after a series of Arsenal minor results in all competitions. They cannot maintain consistency. Sometimes a big win, then surrender silly in the next fight.
Arsenal swallowed two consecutive draws in the Premier League against Crystal Palace (2-2) and Wolverhampton (1-1). In those two games, Arsenal were ahead, but they let their guard down and let the opponent retaliate.
This problem is not the first time this has happened, Arsenal have always been like that, even since the era of Arsene Wenger. Therefore, Emery is considered not really developing Arsenal, it might even be worse.
Emery's position is increasingly difficult because there are actually great players in the Arsenal squad. Reporting from Sky Sports, read more below, Bolaneters!
